## PropertiesInfo type

Properties of an object type, including per-property optionality.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PropertiesInfo<Props extends Properties = Properties> = {
    [Key in keyof Props]: {
        partial: boolean;
        type: Props[Key];
    };
};
```
